publicationStmt.p: Place and Person authorities for the digital editions of Hasidic Stories, created in the framework of the the project "Historical Digital Analysis of Hasidic Stories Until 1914", PI: Gadi Sagiv; Named Entities annotation: Yeshayahu Goldenhersh; Topic annotation: Dorit Peretz; Supervising Editor: Sinai Rusinek. This edition was prepared using an implementation of TEI-Publisher Annotator and the XML-Planter, developed by DH-dev.com (Gil Shalit).
